Text.Page:
Noruk! They're everywhere! They've absolutely taken over the fields, and it won't be long before we'll have nothing to feed the sheep.

Pleaseâ€”will you drive away the {@LinkCreature:6#1011#grazing noruks}? I'd hate to have to abandon the ranch because of these pesky animals!

Oh, thank you!

We wouldn't be having the noruk problem if we weren't having the Gutrend problem. One thing to the next, and all.

Anyway, thank you so much.
